title: U.S. states with state cyber bullying laws as of November 2018
summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Category Of Cyber Bullying Law, and State totals in each Category Of Cyber Bullying Law on the y axis.
Category Of Cyber Bullying Law School policy has the highest State totals and Includes off-campus has the lowest State totals.
The difference of State totals between the highest and lowest Category Of Cyber Bullying Law is 32.0.
min_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Category Of Cyber Bullying Law, and State totals in each Category Of Cyber Bullying Law on the y axis.
Category Of Cyber Bullying Law School policy has the highest State totals and Includes off-campus has the lowest State totals.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Category Of Cyber Bullying Law, and State totals in each Category Of Cyber Bullying Law on the y axis.
Category Of Cyber Bullying Law School policy has the highest State totals and Includes off-campus has the lowest State totals.
The difference of State totals between the highest and lowest Category Of Cyber Bullying Law is 32.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Category Of Cyber Bullying Law in the x axis and State totals in the y axis.
Category Of Cyber Bullying Law School policy has the highest State totals and Includes off-campus has the lowest State totals.
Second maximum State totals is found at Category Of Cyber Bullying Law Includes cyber bullying or online harassment.
There is a difference of 32.0 between the maximum Category Of Cyber Bullying Law School policy and minimum Category Of Cyber Bullying Law Includes off-campus.

The Category Of Cyber Bullying Law School policy has the highest State totals, followed by Includes cyber bullying or online harassment, and School sanction for cyber bullying. Down to the Category Of Cyber Bullying Law Includes off-campus which is the lowest.
The Category Of Cyber Bullying Law School policy has 1.21 times more State totals than average.
Summing up the values of all Category Of Cyber Bullying Laws, we get total 203.0.

data.Category Of Cyber Bullying Law: Includes cyber bullying or online harassment
Criminal Sanction for cyber bullying or electronic harassment
